title: OpenAI CEO says AI will reshape society, acknowledges risks
description: The CEO behind the company that created ChatGPT believes artificial intelligence will reshape society as we know it, but admits there are extraordinary risks.

title: Big banks create $30B rescue package for First Republic
description: Eleven of the biggest banks in the country announced a $30 billion rescue package for First Republic Bank on Thursday, in an effort to stop the California-based bank from becoming the third bank to fail in less than a week

title: Ford recalling over 1 million cars over brake hose issue
description: Ford announced it's recalling certain 2013-2018 Fusion and Lincoln MKZ vehicles because some front brake hoses may rupture and leak brake fluid.

title: WATCH:  Giant pandas at Moscow Zoo celebrate Panda Day
description: The Moscow Zoo prepared special treats for its giant pandas to celebrate Panda Day, though they seemed to prefer their usual meal of bamboo shoots.

title: Prosecutor: Some of the 6 missing women in Mexico found dead
description: A prosecutor in Mexico says there is evidence that some of the six women who went missing on March 7 have been found dead

title: Freed from Nicaraguan prison, he now urges Biden admin to protect migrants like him
description: The release of Nicaraguan prisoners has reignited calls from advocates for the Biden administration to extend Temporary Protected Status, or TPS, for Nicaraguans

title: Planes in Florida close call were cleared to use same runway
description: Federal investigators say an air traffic controller cleared one plane to land and another to take off from the same runway in Florida last month

title: WATCH:  Irish band plays for passengers on flight from Dublin to New York
description: A band from County Armagh, Northern Ireland, put on an impromptu performance for passengers as they wait to deplane.

title: Republican state senator says he's never met a hungry person in Minnesota
description: A GOP lawmaker objected to a bill ensuring lunch for all students in Minnesota.

title: Yellen grilled by senators on bank failures, government response
description: Yellen testified after back-to-back bank failures.

title: New Hampshire Senate passes GOP-backed parents' rights bill
description: New Hampshire has moved closer to adopting “parents’ bill of rights” legislation

title: 14-year-old boy arrested in Mexico for murder of 8
description: Mexican authorities have arrested a 14-year-old boy nicknamed “El Chapito” for the contract killing of eight people near Mexico City

title: School workers in country's 2nd-largest district poised to go on 3-day strike
description: Thousands of Los Angeles public school employees are poised to go on a three-day strike next week amid stalled union negotiations.

title: Chasten Buttigieg responds to what White House calls 'homophobic joke' by Pence
description: Chasten Buttigieg, husband of Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg, responded to former Vice President Mike Pence's recent "attempted joke" on "The View" Thursday.

title: Investigators seek to question lawyer about phone call with Trump: Sources
description: Special counsel Jack Smith is pushing to question Trump attorney Evan Corcoran about an alleged phone regarding efforts to retrieve classified materials, sources say.

title: WATCH:  Kobe Bryant immortalized with hand and footprints at TCL Chinese Theatre in Hollywood
description: “I encourage you to place your hands in his,” Kobe’s daughter Natalia said. “This will be a treasure for the city of Los Angeles and my dad’s fans from all over the world to hold and to cherish.”

title: Army investigating death of soldier who complained of sexual harassment
description: Fort Hood is investigating the death of 21-year-old Pvt. Ana Basalduaruiz, who told her family she was being sexually harassed by a superior last month.

title: Oklahoman pleads guilty to killing 3, cutting heart from one
description: An Oklahoma man has pleaded guilty to killing three people, including a woman whose heart was cut from her body, weeks after being released from prison

title: MLB umpires will have a new view this season -- on Zoom
description: Umpires will have a new view this season

title: Flood deaths in Turkey's earthquake-stricken area rise to 16
description: Rescue teams have retrieved two more bodies after floods struck two Turkish provinces that were already devastated by last month’s powerful earthquake

title: Macron shuns parliament to enact French retirement bill
description: French President Emmanuel Macron has shunned parliament and opted to push through a highly unpopular bill that would raise the retirement age from 62 to 64 by triggering a special constitutional power

title: Seeking Alzheimer's clues from few who escape genetic fate
description: Scientists are digging into why a few people escape the rarest form of Alzheimer's, which is inherited and strikes young

title: UK bans TikTok on government phones on security grounds
description: British authorities say they're banning the Chinese-owned video-sharing app TikTok from government mobile phones on security grounds, following similar moves by the U.S. and European Union

title: US jobless aid claims fell last week as layoffs remain low
description: Fewer Americans applied for jobless claims last week as the labor market continues to thrive despite the Federal Reserve’s efforts to cool the economy and tamp down inflation

title: Poland plans to grant Ukraine's request for fighter jets
description: Poland’s president says his country plans to give Ukraine around a dozen MiG-29 fighter jets

title: Yellen to tell Congress US banking system 'remains sound'
description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen says the U.S. banking system remains sound

title: UN-backed inquiry accuses Russia of war crimes in Ukraine
description: A U.N.-backed investigation has found that Russian attacks against civilians in Ukraine, including systematic torture and killing in occupied regions, amount to war crimes and possibly crimes against humanity

title: Mobile sports bets booming in some states as others shy away
description: The stakes will be higher for March Madness this year in some states

title: Russian security service building catches fire in Rostov
description: A building used by Russia’s Federal Security Service caught fire in the southern Russian city of Rostov, which is located about 70 kilometers (43 miles) from the border with Ukraine

title: WATCH:  US releases footage of Russian fighter's clash with drone
description: The U.S. military released declassified footage showing the moment a Russian fighter collided with an American drone.

title: US military releases video from Russian fighter jet crash with drone
description: U.S. European Command has released dramatic declassified video taken by the MQ-9 Reaper drone that shows the moment that a Russian Su-27 fighter jet collided with it.

title: UN nuclear watchdog: 2.5 tons of uranium missing in Libya
description: Some 2.5 tons of natural uranium stored in a site in war-torn Libya have gone missing

title: Italy retrial ordered for Americans in killing of officer
description: Italy’s highest court has ordered a retrial for two American citizens who were convicted in the slaying of an Italian carabiniere during a sting operation gone bad

title: US, partners stage military drills amid Japan-S. Korea talks
description: The U.S., Canada, India, Japan and South Korea are staging joint anti-submarine warfare drills amid talks between Japanese and South Korean leaders aimed at strengthening their alliance with Washington against threats from China and North Korea

title: Major oil project approval intensifies Alaska Natives' rift
description: The Biden administration’s approval this week of the biggest oil drilling project in Alaska in decades promises to widen a rift among Alaska Natives

title: 2 young skiers rescued after being stuck in snow for 3 hours with phone battery at 9%
description: Two young skiers were rescued Tuesday night after getting lost while skiing outside the Wachusett Mountain ski area boundaries, authorities say.

title: Biden admin demands TikTok's Chinese owner sell stakes or risk being banned: Official
description: The Biden administration is demanding TikTok's Chinese owner sell its stake in the app or risk getting banned, the company and a U.S. official told ABC News.

title: Mother reaches settlement with amusement park, ride operator after teen's fatal fall
description: The mother of a teen who fell to his death from the Orlando FreeFall ride has reached a settlement with the amusement park and ride's operator, her attorney said.
